metadescription: Web application designed to help people that have ran into problems with their computer
noAccount: Don't have an account yet? clik here
alreadyAccount: Already have an account? clik here
strongerPassword: Password needs to have at least 8 characters one digit, one lowercase and uppercase letter
emailRegistered: This email is already registered, try to login or reset your password
invalidCredentials: Incorrect email or password, try again or reset the password
readThrough: Read through the basic information for using this app in the chat mock up below:
message_1: what is IT'sFixed you ask? It stands for "information technology is fixed"
message_2: And it is an online helpdesk designed for people strugling with their computers and not having the time or the expertiece to find the solution themsefls.
message_3: wow that sounds amazing what do I do if i want someone to help me.
message_4: It couldn't be more simple belive me :) you just sign up to the app using you email and a password or u can also use your Google or Facebook account if you'd like.
message_5: After that you just go to the tickets tab and create your first ticket. You choose from the chosen topics or create a new one for yourself describe the problem and that is it.
message_7: What happends then? How can I be sure you are going to help me?
message_8: After you created your ticket you will have a chat just like this one in front of you and you'll be waiting for one of our operators to join.
message_9:
The operators are not our employees, their selected users of this app with some background in IT usually collage students doing good deads with their free time. 
 We cannot guarantee that every single one of your problems is going to be fixed not everything is even posible to fix online like this, our goal is to send you on the right track to figuring out sollution to your problem and save you as much time as posible.
message_10: That makes a lot of sence. Not everything can be delt with over the internet.
message_11: Next time a run into some issues with my computer I'll give it a shot.
message_12: That is exactly right. Thank you, We couldn't ask for more.
message_13: If you have any other questions feel free to create a ticket and ask one of our operators.
